title: Old legacy skin reworks
body:
Old legacy skins are the rarest group of skins in league (excluding hextech annie). Back when they were created riot didnt have the technology or the resources to recolour their effects and change their splasharts. For the most part, these old skins are just recolours of the original game model and splash art. I think it would be hella cool if people lucky enough to own something like Silver Kayle or Human Ryze had something else to look forward to than comments about how rare it is. Why cant we make these skins really cool to see in game too? You could spend a couple of dollars and get a better looking skin than these 5 year old treasures. And it would make people who own these skins feel a lot more inclined to use them. Just a thought.

no, they're not. a skin cannot be a legacy skin and a limited skin at the same time.
a legacy skin comes back whenever riot opens the legacy vault, and can always be obtained from a mystery gift.
a limited skin is available once, and only once, and cannot be obtained via mystery gift, for example, championship riven or urfwick.

Human Ryze would have been updated when they updated him and all his skins. I think if you check out a lot of Limited Skins and old Legacy skins, you will see they have had an update and not left like they were when first released.
